Posts.Content: Hi Jackiruss stay as positive as you can and tell the chemo nurses about your throat - I got ranitodane from them and that really helped my throat and digestion They are there to make you better! and yes drink as much fluid as you can and rest as much as you can. Â I've just had my 4th of 6 so stay positive!- you will feel better - good luck x
Posts.Title: First chemo was on 17th August
